A8 should always be a white square. This game starts out with the pieces configured wrong. The white kings bishop is black when it should be the white bishop, and so on. The pieces themselves, especially the queens and kings are too difficult to tell apart. 
Hi my man would fix these things, it would be a fun game.
summary: Queen and king start on wrong squares!

Ok game if you just want to play against computer. Needs more than 8 levels. Like at least 20 levels (800 -2000 elo), more is better. Add the ability to install uci chess engines would be a great improvement!

The 2D adjustable screen size works fine as does the automated movement. Not sure why some reviewers are having problems with this.?

I've been waiting for a really nice chess GUI to be added to the linux repository. In my opinion, Shredder makes the best Chess GUI that is compatible with linux (not free). Also Lucus is good and freeware (linux compatible versions). Sometimes sound quits working though. Banksia has good graphics but is buggy and say you loose in the middle of a game. Cute chess is ok but low quality graphics and no sound. (even chess titans windows 7 was pretty good).

Loads of really nice chess GUI's for windows but nothing really nice for Linux (execpt Shredder). Please someone make a nice Chess GUI so We can play a nice game (against computer), large board (2D), UCI compatable, sound when a piece is moved, 100 levels from beginner to master. I don't want to have to use microsoft ever again! Thank you!
summary: More levels please... Need new GUI

description: This chess game isn't bad. I just wish it would let me maximize the screen. It's a small screen size, and that's unchangeable.
i thought that this would have a functional chess engine but it does not have a working engine it needs some work and i had to play myself. Bad Game bvut the concept is good
Schönes Schachspiel. Grafisch gut, der "Sound" könnte besser sein. Ich habe ein paar Minuten gespielt und es hat Spaß gemacht. Über die Spielstärke kann ich noch nichts sagen.
Denke auf der Stufe einfach auch für Anfänger geeignet
summary: Für Schach mal zwischendurch sehr schöne Grafik,

description: Cuando el REY esta en JAQUE, no se puede proteger con otra ficha el JAQUE, te obliga a mover la posicion del REY. Esto no es una regla que deberian arreglar en el juego.

description: La mejor aplicación que encontré de ajedrez para Ubuntu.
Por alguna extraña razón no te permite realizar ciertos movimientos, y además que tiene un diseño horrible con unos "personajes" de anime en la parte superior y el tablero de papel JAJA

Interface peu agréable même si pas forcément horrible hestétiquement mais surtout pas agréable dans le maniement des pièces, leur animation... L'ordi le plus fort joue un système solide avec les noirs qui n'est pas réputé pour être franchement efficace. Bref, à éviter quelque soit votre niveau.
Bonne continuation l’équipe
